Name: Z-Triple Layer Barrier
Effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Physical and Special Attacks. If the user is Silver Rank or higher, User and Allies instead receive 2 less damage from Special attacks. At Diamond Rank or higher, 3 less. This effect doesn't stack with Reflect and Light Screen. Lasts 6 Rounds. Prio 1.
Description: Chester creates barriers around him and the party to reduce as much damage as possible, creating three layers of energy that reduce the impact.
